actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-786.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the Conference report on the bill (S. 643) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the procedures for the admission of refugees, to amend the Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1962 to establish a more uniform basis for the provision of assistance to refugees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order against the conference report on S. 643 (Refugee assistance).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the Conference report on the bill (S. 643) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the procedures for the admission of refugees, to amend the Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1962 to establish a more uniform basis for the provision of assistance to refugees, and for other purposes.
